violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Surname 'Ведерников' and other contact data (city, first name) are recorded without an explicit echo confirmation question like 'Верно?' or 'Правильно?'; the agent only repeats the data.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: From 'Давайте сейчас посмотрим сразу' (~1:12) until 'Ну вот смотрите. Есть...' (~1:55) the main product search lasts about 43 seconds, which falls into the 40–45s flag-only window.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After completing the long search and beginning to present results, the agent never says 'Спасибо за ожидание' or similar; only 'Спасибо за заказ' appears at the very end of the call.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method for contact data (7.2) not fully applied.
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Whenever recording any contact data (name, surname, city, phone, address), repeat the data back and explicitly ask for confirmation (e.g. 'Верно?', 'Правильно?' or 'Подтверждаете номер?') and wait for a clear 'Да'.

coaching_priorities.issue: No explicit thanks for waiting after search (9.3).
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After finishing any information search, especially if it takes more than a few seconds, add a phrase like 'Спасибо за ожидание' before giving the answer.

coaching_priorities.issue: Main product search took about 43 seconds (9.1 flag window).
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Try to shorten search time by preparing filters and product lists in advance and, during longer searches, briefly update the customer on progress to improve perceived service.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language from the agent appears in the transcript; tone is consistently polite.

2.1.evidence: The call ends with mutual goodbyes after order confirmation; there is no unjustified refusal of service or abrupt disconnect.

3.1.evidence: Customer receives clear information on product availability, price, installation option, pick-up date, location, order number and payment methods; the initial request is fully resolved.

3.3.evidence: Agent provides only standard commercial information and confirms the customer's own contact data; no internal phone numbers, passwords or third-party personal data are disclosed.

3.6.evidence: Agent explicitly announces searches ('сейчас посмотрим', 'сейчас проверяю') before giving key factual information; there are no obvious "from memory" answers.
3.6.note: Project rules about mandatory database verification are not visible in the transcript; assessed as PASS based on available text only.

4.1.evidence: Customer remains calm and cooperative; the agent stays patient and structured with no textual signs of frustration or loss of control.
4.1.note: Criterion relies heavily on tone; transcript-only judgment.

5.1.evidence: Customer receives key information about tyres, total price, pick-up point, date and payment options; no clearly requested mandatory details are missing.
5.1.note: Full check of mandatory information would require project-specific configuration.

6.1.evidence: There are no silences longer than 45 seconds and no customer hang-up; the call closes normally.

7.1.evidence: Agent uses a full greeting with company and operator name and offers help, and closes the call with thanks and goodbye.

7.2.evidence: Phone number is repeated and confirmed ('Да, да, да, да'), but first name, surname and city are recorded without an explicit confirmation question like 'Верно?' or 'Правильно?'; per rules this counts as an echo method violation.
7.2.note: Contact data set (name, surname, city, phone) is partially but not fully confirmed; overall criterion 7.2 is graded as VIOLATION.

7.3.evidence: First agent phrase starts at about 3.6s from call start (<5s), and the call ends immediately after the final 'До свидания' with no extended post-conversation delay.

7.4.evidence: Transcript shows turn-taking without overlapping phrases where the agent cuts the customer off without an apology.

9.1.evidence: From 'Давайте сейчас посмотрим сразу' (~1:12) to 'Ну вот смотрите. Есть...' (~1:55) the search lasts about 43 seconds.
9.1.note: Duration falls into the 40–45 second flag-only window; no score reduction but improvement recommended.

9.3.evidence: After the product search is finished, the agent does not say 'Спасибо за ожидание' or similar thanks for waiting; only generic thanks for the order at the very end.

10.2.evidence: Call follows a logical sales script: greeting, need clarification, offer, order confirmation, extra services and polite closing.

10.3.evidence: Agent manages the dialogue structure, uses the customer's name and leads the conversation to a clear conclusion while checking if anything else is needed.

10.6.evidence: Key information about product, promotions, logistics and payment is provided clearly; no obvious factual gaps are visible in the transcript.
10.6.note: Assessment is limited by lack of full project information matrix; some completeness aspects may depend on external configuration.

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company and operator name and clear offer to help.
Careful clarification of tyre parameters (size, season, studs, model) before confirming the order.
Clear explanation of price, pick-up location, date and additional benefits (free storage bags, puncture protection program).
Order details (product, size, model, price and order number) are summarised for the customer before closing.
Polite closing with confirmation that nothing else is needed and thanks for the order.

data_quality.confidence_notes: Minor ASR artefacts (typos, one speaker-label inversion near closing) but they do not affect detection of key criteria.
